name: cv
description: Multi-format resume builder with variants support

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:formats
scripts.build:formats: npm run build:md && npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf && npm run build:docx
scripts.build:watch: node scripts/build.js && node scripts/generate-markdown.js && resumed render resume.json --theme ${npm_package_config_theme} --output dist/resume.html && npm run build:docx && node scripts/add-download-links.js && cp dist/resume.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:html: resumed render resume.json --theme ${npm_package_config_theme} --output dist/resume.html && node scripts/add-download-links.js && cp dist/resume.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:pdf: pandoc dist/resume.md -o dist/resume.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex 2>/dev/null || echo 'PDF generation requires LaTeX (xelatex). Skipping...'
scripts.build:docs:
npm run build:md && npm run build:pdf && npm run build:docx && echo '
âœ… Generated PDF and DOCX in dist/'
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "nodemon --watch resume --ext yaml,yml,json --exec npm run build:watch" "live-server dist --port=3000 --entry-file=resume.html --no-browser"
